member.name: T:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.DocumentationBreadcrumb
member.summary: A breadcrumb that helps navigating between documentation pages.

remarks.para: This breadcrumb component shows the following structure based on the parameters set on the component.

item.description: The link to the home page. If is set to null, the home link is not shown in the breadcrumb.
The assembly or library being documented. Points to the URI returned by the where the parameter is the key set on the on this breadcrumb.
The or the namespace of the type specified in .

description.para: If you specify then you don't have to specify , because that is resolved from .
If you specify , then you don't have to specify nor , because they are resolved from .

member.name: P:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.DocumentationBreadcrumb.HomeLabel
member.summary: The label that is used to point to the home page.

member.name: P:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.DocumentationBreadcrumb.HomeUrl
member.summary: The URL to the home page. If set to null, the home link is not shown.

member.name: P:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.DocumentationBreadcrumb.MemberName
member.summary: The member name of the member to use when building the breadcrumb.

member.name: P:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.DocumentationBreadcrumb.Namespace
member.summary: The namespace to use when building the breadcrumb.
member.remarks: This parameter is ignored if is specified. The namespace shown is defined by that type name.

member.name: P:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.DocumentationBreadcrumb.TypeName
member.summary: The type name of the type to use when building the breadcrumb.

member.name: T:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.DocumentationComponentBase
member.summary: The base class for all components used to generate documentation from .NET XML documentation.

member.name: P:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.DocumentationComponentBase.LibraryKey
member.summary: The key that will be used to get the current documentation parser from .

member.name: P:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.DocumentationComponentBase.Factory
member.summary: The documentation parser factory that will be used to get documentation parsers with.
member.remarks: An instance of the must be added as a service to the services collection at startup. It will then be injected to this property automatically whenever needed.

member.name: P:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.DocumentationComponentBase.Parser
member.summary: Returns the documentation parser to use in the component.

member.name: P:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.DocumentationComponentBase.UriBuilder
member.summary: The URI builder that is used by components to build URIs to various sections within the documentation.

member.name: T:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.EventList
member.summary: Displays a list of events.

member.name: P:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.EventList.HeadingTemplate
member.summary: Allows you to provide a heading for the list.
member.remarks: This template is rendered only if the list has methods to show.

member.name: P:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.EventList.Filter
member.summary: A filter that is used to filter the events shown in the list.
member.remarks: If set to null, all events are shown.

member.name: P:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.EventList.Events
member.summary: A collection of events to show in the list.

example.para: This example shows you a simple way of using the FieldList component.

member.name: P:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.FieldList.HeadingTemplate
member.summary: Allows you to specify how the heading for the list is rendered.
member.remarks: This tempate is only rendered if there are any fields to show in the list.

member.name: P:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.FieldList.Filter
member.summary: A filter expression that is used to filter the fields shown in the list.
member.remarks: If not specified, all fields are listed.

member.name: P:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.FieldList.Fields
member.summary: The filtered list of fields to show in the component.

member.name: T:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.LibraryCard
member.summary: A card component that displays basic information about a library represented by an instance loaded into a service.

member.name: P:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.LibraryCard.ImageUrl
member.summary: The URL to an image to show in the card.
member.remarks: If this parameter is not set, no image is shown in the card.

member.name: P:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.LibraryCard.ReadMoreLabel
member.summary: The label for the Read more link.

remarks.para: If this parameter is not set, the default Read more... is used.
The URL for the Read more link is resolved by using the instance using the when calling the method.

member.name: P:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.LibraryCard.ReadMoreUrl
member.summary: The URL for the read more link.

member.name: T:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.LibraryCardFooter
member.summary: Represents the footer of a component.

member.name: P:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.LibraryCardFooter.ReadMoreUrl
member.summary: The URL for the Read more link.

remarks.para: If the URL is not specified, no link is rendered.
Absolute URLs are considered as external links and are opened in a new browser tab. Relative URLs are opened in the same browser tab.

member.name: P:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.LibraryCardFooter.ReadMoreLabel
member.summary: The label for the Read more link.

member.name: T:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.MemberDocumentationBase
member.summary:
A base class for creating documentation for different types of members, such as:
Method
Property
Field
Event

member.name: P:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.MemberDocumentationBase.MemberName
member.summary: The name of the member.

member.name: P:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.MemberDocumentationBase.Documentation
member.summary: The documentation associated with the member specified in .

member.name: T:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.MemberView
member.summary: A component that is used to display details of one member.

member.name: T:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.MethodList
member.summary: A component that lists methods from the type specified in the parameter.

member.name: F:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.MethodList.ConstructorFilter
member.summary: A filter expression that includes only constructor methods.

member.name: F:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.MethodList.NonConstructorFilter
member.summary: A filter expression that includes all other methods except for constructors.

member.name: P:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.MethodList.HeadingTemplate
member.summary: Allows you to provide a heading for the list.
member.remarks: This template is rendered only if the list has methods to show.

member.name: P:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.MethodList.Filter
member.summary: A filter that is used to filter the methods shown in the list.
member.remarks: If set to null, all methods are shown.

member.name: P:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.MethodList.Methods
member.summary: A collection of methods to list.

member.name: T:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.NamespaceDocumentationBase
member.summary: A base class for components that handle a given namespace.

member.name: P:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.NamespaceDocumentationBase.Namespace
member.summary: The namespace to process in the derived component.

member.name: T:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.NamespaceList
member.summary: Lists all namespaces from the underlying .

member.name: P:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.NamespaceList.Filter
member.summary: A filter expression that is used to filter the namespaces shown in the list.
member.remarks: By default, all namespaces are shown.

member.name: P:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.NamespaceList.Namespaces
member.summary: The namespaces to show in the list.

member.name: T:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.NamespaceView
member.summary: A view component that displays the contents of a given namespace.

member.name: T:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.PropertyList
member.summary: A component that lists properties.

member.name: P:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.PropertyList.HeadingTemplate
member.summary: Allows you to provide a heading for the list.
member.remarks: This template is rendered only if the list has properties to show.

member.name: P:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.PropertyList.Filter
member.summary: A filter that is used to filter the properties shown in the list.
member.remarks: If set to null, all properties are shown.

member.name: P:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.PropertyList.Properties
member.summary: A collection of properties to list.

member.name: T:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.Services.DocumentationUriBuilder
member.summary: An implementation that is used by components to build URIs with. URIs built with this implementation are used to point to various sections within the documentation.

remarks.para: The URIs produced can be anything, both relative or absolute. By convention, components that use URIs produced by an implementation will treat absolute URIs as external links that are opened by default in a new browser tab.
This can be configured by setting the property to false, which will result in external links being opened in the same browser tab.

member.name: M:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.Services.DocumentationUriBuilder.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.Services.DocumentationUriBuilder.OpenExternalsInNewTab
member.summary: Specifies whether external links should be opened in a new browser tab.
member.remarks: Absolute URIs are considered as external links are are opened in a new browser tab by default.

member.name: M:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.Services.DocumentationUriBuilder.GetAssemblyUri(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the URI that points to the page that documents the assembly represented by the given .
member.param: The key that represents the documentation for an assembly that is loaded into the current .

member.name: M:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.Services.DocumentationUriBuilder.GetMemberUri(System.String,System.Reflection.MemberInfo)
member.summary: Returns the URI for the given member.
member.param: The key that specifies library the member originates from. If null, the given member is considered an external member.
The member to return the URI for.

member.name: M:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.Services.DocumentationUriBuilder.GetNamespaceUri(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns the URI for the given namespace.
member.remarks: If is null, it means that the given is not from any of the parsers loaded into , which indicates that the is not documented by the running application.
member.param: The key that specifies the parser in that produced the given .
The namespace to create the URI for.

member.name: M:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.Services.DocumentationUriBuilder.GetTypeUri(System.String,System.Type)
member.summary: Returns the URI for the given type.
member.remarks: If is null, it means that the given is not from any of the parsers loaded into , which indicates that the is not documented by the running application.
member.param: The key that specifies the parser in that produced the given .
The type for which to return the URI.

member.name: T:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.TypeDeclaration
member.summary: This component outputs just the declaration of the type specified in the parameter.

member.name: P:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.TypeDeclaration.LowerCase
member.summary: Outputs everything in lower case if set to true.

member.name: P:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.TypeDeclaration.Type
member.summary: The type for which to produce the declaration.

member.name: P:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.TypeDeclaration.Declaration
member.summary: The type declaration to output in the component.

member.name: T:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.TypeDocumentationBase
member.summary: A base class for all components handling the type specified in .

member.name: P:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.TypeDocumentationBase.TypeName
member.summary: The full name of the type handled in the current component.

member.name: P:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.TypeDocumentationBase.Documentation
member.summary: The documentation for the type specified in .

member.name: P:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.TypeIcon.Type
member.summary: The type for which to show the icon.

member.name: P:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.TypeIcon.IconUrl
member.summary: The URL of the icon.

member.name: T:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.TypeLink
member.summary: Creates a link that points to the type specified in .

remarks.para: This component requires that the (or a derived implementation) has been added to the services collection of your application.
By convention, links to relative URIs are opened in the same browser tag. Absolute URIs are considered as external links and opened in a new browser tab.

member.name: P:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.TypeLink.Type
member.summary: The type to create a link to.

member.name: P:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.TypeLink.Url
member.summary: The URL to show in the link.

member.name: P:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.TypeLink.Text
member.summary: The text to show in the link.

member.name: P:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.TypeList.HeadingTemplate
member.summary: Allows you to provide a heading for the list.
member.remarks: This template is rendered only if the list has types to show.

member.name: P:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.TypeList.Filter
member.summary: Specifies a filter to apply to the types shown in the list.
member.remarks: is always used as filter, regardless of the other properties.

member.name: P:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.TypeList.Namespace
member.summary: The namespace whose types to show in the list.

member.name: P:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.TypeList.Types
member.summary: The types to show in the list.

member.name: T:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.TypeView
member.summary: Shows the contents of type specified in the parameter.

member.name: T:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.Xml.CNode
member.summary: Represents a <c> element in XML documentation.

member.name: T:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.Xml.CodeNode
member.summary: Represents a <code> element in XML documentation.

member.name: T:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.Xml.CrefAnchorNode
member.summary: Use this component with any XML documentation node that contains a cref attribute. This component will make the member reference in that cref attribute into a link that points to the documentation for the specified member.
member.remarks: If the cref attribute points to a type or member that is not handled by any of the instances loaded into the current service, then the link will point to Google to search for the member.

member.name: T:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.Xml.CRefParentBase
member.summary: Base class for nodes that contain a cref attribute.

member.name: P:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.Xml.CRefParentBase.UriBuilder
member.summary: The URI builder used by the component.

member.name: P:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.Xml.CRefParentBase.Factory
member.summary: A documentation parser factory that the component uses.

member.name: P:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.Xml.CRefParentBase.LinkUrl
member.summary: The URI that the cref attribute points to.

member.name: P:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.Xml.CRefParentBase.LinkText
member.summary: The text to show in the link.

member.name: T:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.Xml.ElementNode
member.summary: Represents an XML element in XML documentation. This element will select the actual rendering based on the name of the node specified in .
member.remarks: For a list of elements that this component supports, see https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/programming-guide/xmldoc/recommended-tags-for-documentation-comments#tags

member.name: T:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.Xml.ExceptionsList
member.summary: Builds a list of exception documentation from the node list.

member.name: P:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.Xml.ExceptionsList.SourceNodes
member.summary: A collection of nodes to search for <exception /> nodes in.
member.remarks: The list specified does not have to be filtered to include only exception elements. The rendering logic will take care of that filtering.

member.name: P:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.Xml.ExceptionsList.ExceptionNodes
member.summary: The exception nodes to display in the list.

member.name: T:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.Xml.ListNode
member.summary: Represents a <list> element in XML documentation.

member.name: T:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.Xml.NodeComponentBase
member.summary: The base class for components that render XML documentation nodes.

member.name: P:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.Xml.NodeComponentBase.Node
member.summary: The node to render in the component.
member.remarks: Derived components must handle null values for this parameter.

member.name: T:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.Xml.NodeList
member.summary: Represents a set of XML nodes in XML documentation. Renders each node appropriately.
member.remarks: Rendering is implemented based on the of each node loaded into the property.

member.name: P:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.Xml.NodeList.Nodes
member.summary: The collection of nodes to render.

member.name: T:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.Xml.ParaNode
member.summary: Represents a <para> element in XML documentation.

member.name: T:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.Xml.RemarksNode
member.summary: Represents a <remarks> element in XML documentation.

member.name: T:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.Xml.SeeNode
member.summary: Represents the <see cref="..." /> element in XML documentation.

member.name: T:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.Xml.SummaryNode
member.summary: Represents a <summary> element in XML documentation.

member.name: T:Blazorade.XmlDocumentation.Components.Xml.TextNode
member.summary: Represents a text node in XML documentation.
